attributes.action: Let fans in to lower leagues clubs with low capacity
attributes.additional_details: Cuz lower league clubs need fans to help them out
attributes.background: Let fans back in to lower league clubs with a low capacity

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow football fans to attend matches at all levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552036

Allow the return of spectators to football at all levels below national league: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334366
